'''Wrathful Recompense''' is [[Neuvillette]]'s Level 6 [[Constellation]].

==Gameplay Notes==
* The additional currents will only trigger upon hitting an enemy with Charged Attack: Equitable Judgment. The currents will lock onto the enemy that the Charged Attack hits and have homing properties.
